input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt

Item features:
100% Polyester
Quality tested and ensured for maximum durability
Designed with only the toughest, roughest users in mind
Comfort and Performance come hand in hand with Rothco

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is made of 100% polyester, ensuring it will hold up to even the toughest, roughest uses. With comfort and performance in mind, this shirt is designed for those with the most demanding of lifestyles, so you can rely on it to get the job done.
input_text.Response B: Rothco makes quality outdoor and sports gear for all types of situations. Whether you are in a combat-intensive environment, or if you are a recreational user, Rothco will fit the lifestyle of many. Quality tested for maximum durability, comfort and performance come hand in hand with Rothco. This Marines T-Shirt is made of 100% polyester.
